body: Groupwatch is a streaming service that allows you to watch a wide array of TV shows or programmes with anyone else.
The best part is, Groupwatch is free! (just kidding)

header: Where can I watch, and who can I watch with?

body: Why would you ever want to? It's free!

header: What can I watch on Groupwatch?
body: Check out our library of vast treasures for you to watch!
